General.Name: DHG Pharmaceutical JSC
General.Description: DHG Pharmaceutical Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of pharmaceutical products primarily in Vietnam. It offers antibiotic, analgesic and antipyretic, respiratory, nutrition, musculoskeletal, gastrointestinal and hepatobiliary, nervous system and ophthalmic, cardiovascular and diabetic, and dermatology and beauty care products. The company also manufactures and trades in dietary supplements and pharmaceutical cosmetics, as well as medical tools, supplies, and equipment. It also exports its products to Moldova, Ukraine, Romania, Myanmar, Russia, Mongolia, Cambodia, Nigeria, Laos, Singapore, Jordan, Sri Lanka, and North Korea. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Can Tho, Vietnam. DHG Pharmaceutical Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Taisho Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.
